headline: Show HN: I made a minimalist time blocking app
description:
I made a time blocking app with a minimalist look & feel, only time blocking one day at a time, customisable intervals and easy to organize without overlapping.

Current features: - choose an interval of the block to 1 hour, 30 minutes and 15 minutes. - easy to add a break time block with a single click. - easy to organise the block with drag and drop to the desired slot. - clear the day and start new for the next day

Thank you, you can send suggestions and feedback on the website (https://timeist.corneliusventi.dev) through the feedback button at the bottom left corner.
